name: Atlantean Sub Zero
description: The legendary Lin Kuei assassin, master of ice and cold. His frozen powers can chill enemies to the bone. Now he fights alongside you to protect Atlantis.

abilities.name: Ice Ball
abilities.description: Hurls a freezing ice ball that deals 395 + 125% Magical Damage as magical damage. Has a 33% chance to FREEZE the target for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Raises an icy barrier granting all allies a shield equal to 300% of their Magical Shield for 2 turns. Attackers hitting the barrier have a 20% chance to be FROZEN for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: Unleashes a chilling explosion dealing 325 magical damage to all enemies. Deals an additional 100% Magical Damage for each debuff the target has.

abilities.name: Ice Sword Strike
abilities.description: Strikes an enemy with an ice sword dealing 100% Physical Damage. Has a 100% chance to FREEZE the target for 5 turns.

passive.name: Frozen Aura
passive.description: When Atlantean Sub Zero is damaged, the attacker has an 8% chance to be frozen for 2 turns.
